Articles.Content: Jewel, any updates?

Jewel, any updates?

Currently doing final testing on the new probe sized air envelope (adjusting nodes, mass/lift balance, etc)

Drone is currently on hold for the moment while I figure out engines.

Currently doing final testing on the new probe sized air envelope (adjusting nodes, mass/lift balance, etc)

Drone is currently on hold for the moment while I figure out engines.

Could leave attachment points for us to add light ion or electric motors?

Could leave attachment points for us to add light ion or electric motors?

True but the only issue is also getting the balance correct.

I almost have the probe sized part done. Then i am doing tech tree integration for the subs.
Sweet. I've finally gotten a airship together enough to use for exploring Kerbin. Unrelated question is, will you be updating the launch pads? Or do those already work, just need the updated EL?

Sweet. I've finally gotten a airship together enough to use for exploring Kerbin. Unrelated question is, will you be updating the launch pads? Or do those already work, just need the updated EL?

I am not certain about that. I will need to look and see if any modules have changed.

Now uploading the V2.3.0 update to the Airship Mod.

EDIT: It appears that Spaceport is not wanting to let me update the mod there so I am putting it in a temp location here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/qb8y222454cufyw/Hooligan%20Labs%20Airships%20V2.3.0.zip

Changes in this update:

Changed version number to keep in line with previous versions

Added probe sized air envelope

Edited November 28, 2013 by JewelShisen
I'll start playing with the new update to see if I can break it =D Might melt computer before hand though.

I'll start playing with the new update to see if I can break it =D Might melt computer before hand though.

You would be surprised how happy that actually makes me!

The HL Submarine mod has now been brought into the 0.22 Tech Tree!

No new parts have been added but I plan to get some probe sizes done once I have the airship drone working right.

The HL Submarine mod has now been brought into the 0.22 Tech Tree!

No new parts have been added but I plan to get some probe sizes done once I have the airship drone working right.

Gah, I'm still mid-mission from before you released the updated Airships. Can't wait to get my mission to a stopping point to test/break all the things with other mods.

Gah, I'm still mid-mission from before you released the updated Airships. Can't wait to get my mission to a stopping point to test/break all the things with other mods.

Hehe~ Can't wait to see what everybody thinks of the tech tree locations.

If I like how Subs plays with my game, I'll go ahead and use it in my career mode =) I already enjoy airships too much.

I might create a floating sub that floats to where I want it, lands in the ocean, then does the researching things.

If I like how Subs plays with my game, I'll go ahead and use it in my career mode =) I already enjoy airships too much.

I might create a floating sub that floats to where I want it, lands in the ocean, then does the researching things.

Sounds cool! Can't wait to see what you make!
Found 1 problem already, going to chalk it up to me being an idiot for now though. All new part, are not in my sandbox. But it's an old sandbox, so that might have something to do with it.

Found 1 problem already, going to chalk it up to me being an idiot for now though. All new part, are not in my sandbox. But it's an old sandbox, so that might have something to do with it.

Odd... Parts should always show up in sandbox.

Very. Also discovered that the Megastrut part you sent me a while back is very much hated by FAR.

Redid my install (Copy, paste, delete old saves and DR/FAR) and the parts are there!

Edited November 28, 2013 by Jivaii

Those are SUPER squished vertically...

Did you look at the album? It was meant to be small, and I barely used any of the buoyancy to make it float.

Screen is set to 5000p x 1000p

O.O wow... that is REALLY wide and short screen...

It drives me nuts to have it expand onto the top row of monitors, and I'm using this setup.

Probe isn't tech tree integrated yet? I added it in with the stayputnik probe.

Also, figured out my issue on why it didn't show me the parts before. I have Part Catalog installed, and didn't update it with new parts.
